description: This source file implements logging functionality using the log4c library, providing initialization, cleanup, and message logging methods that map custom priorities to log4c levels and handle variadic arguments.

methods.name: void initIcLogger()
methods.description: Initializes the log4c logging system by calling log4c_init.

methods.name: void closeIcLogger()
methods.description: Terminates the log4c logging system by calling log4c_fini.

methods.name: void icLogMsg(const char * file,size_t filelen,const char * func,size_t funclen,long line,const char * categoryName,logPriority priority,const char * format,...)
methods.description: Logs a message with specified file, function, line, category, priority, and format, mapping internal log priorities to log4c levels and forwarding variadic arguments.

ctags.name: icLogMsg
ctags.signature: (const char * file,size_t filelen,const char * func,size_t funclen,long line,const char * categoryName,logPriority priority,const char * format,...)
